content.metaTitle: Luxury 4-Bed Villa Jávea €1.995M | Sea Views Balcón al Mar
content.metaDescription: Exclusive modern Ibizan villa in Portichol, Jávea. 4 bedrooms, sea views, 1548m² plot. Prime Costa Blanca location near beaches. Turnkey delivery by Miralbo.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa MIR0156, an exceptional luxury residence that epitomizes sophisticated Mediterranean living in one of Costa Blanca's most coveted locations. This stunning 4-bedroom villa, masterfully designed in contemporary Ibizan style, occupies a privileged position in the prestigious Balcón al Mar area of Jávea, where panoramic sea views and tranquil surroundings create an unparalleled lifestyle experience.

Nestled on an expansive 1,548m² plot, this architectural masterpiece by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana seamlessly blends modern luxury with the timeless charm of Mediterranean design. Every element has been carefully curated to maximize the stunning coastal vistas, while the villa's prime location offers both serenity and convenience, with Spain's most beautiful beaches, world-class dining, and international amenities just moments away.

locationSection.intro:
The exclusive Balcón al Mar area of Jávea represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca luxury living, where dramatic clifftop locations meet pristine Mediterranean coastline. This prestigious enclave is renowned for its privacy, natural beauty, and proximity to some of Spain's most spectacular beaches, including the crystal-clear waters of Portichol and the award-winning Cala Granadella.

Jávea itself is consistently ranked among Spain's most desirable residential destinations, attracting discerning international buyers who appreciate its unique microclimate, rich cultural heritage, and exceptional quality of life. The town perfectly balances traditional Spanish charm with modern amenities, offering residents access to excellent healthcare, renowned international schools, championship golf courses, and a vibrant expatriate community.
highlights: Walking distance to pristine Portichol beach and exclusive beach clubs
Minutes from award-winning Cala Granadella, consistently rated Spain's best beach
Close proximity to Jávea's historic town center with authentic tapas bars and markets
Easy access to top-rated international schools including Xàbia International College
30 minutes from Alicante Airport with direct flights to major European cities

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa MIR0156 showcases the finest in contemporary Mediterranean architecture, where clean Ibizan lines meet luxurious functionality across 190m² of thoughtfully designed living space. Every room has been positioned to capture the mesmerizing sea views, while premium finishes and cutting-edge technology ensure effortless modern living.
features: 4 spacious en-suite bedrooms, each with private bathrooms and sea views
Open-plan designer kitchen with premium appliances and seamless indoor-outdoor flow
Expansive living areas with floor-to-ceiling windows maximizing natural light
Spectacular infinity-style swimming pool with integrated chill-out area
Landscaped Mediterranean gardens across 1,548m² private plot
Covered carport accommodating 2 vehicles with additional parking space
Panoramic sea views from every level of the property
Latest home automation and energy-efficient systems throughout
Premium natural materials including stone and wood accents
Multiple outdoor terraces perfect for al fresco dining and entertaining

content.investmentSection:
Jávea's luxury property market has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, with premium villas in sought-after locations like Balcón al Mar consistently outperforming broader market trends. The area's limited supply of buildable plots, combined with strict planning regulations protecting the natural landscape, ensures the exclusivity and long-term value appreciation of properties like Villa MIR0156.

The Costa Blanca continues to attract significant international investment, driven by Spain's favorable tax policies for residents, excellent healthcare system, and year-round Mediterranean climate. Properties of this caliber in prime Jávea locations have shown strong rental yields for those seeking holiday rental income, while the growing trend toward remote working has increased demand from buyers seeking permanent Mediterranean residences. With Miralbo Urbana's reputation for quality construction and premium finishes, this villa represents both an exceptional lifestyle investment and a sound financial decision.
whyBuySection: Exclusive Balcón al Mar location with uninterrupted Mediterranean sea views
Turnkey delivery by prestigious developer Miralbo Urbana with premium finishes included
Walking distance to Spain's most beautiful beaches and exclusive beach clubs
Modern Ibizan architecture designed for optimal privacy and natural light
Large 1,548m² private plot offering space, tranquility and future expansion potential
Strong investment fundamentals in Jávea's proven luxury property market
Easy access to international schools, healthcare, and Alicante Airport connections

faqs.question: What is the total price and are there payment options available?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0156 is priced at €1,995,000. We can arrange flexible payment schedules tied to construction milestones, and our mortgage specialists can help secure competitive financing options for qualified buyers.

faqs.question: How close is the villa to beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: The villa is within walking distance of beautiful Portichol beach and just minutes from the award-winning Cala Granadella. Jávea's town center with shops, restaurants, and services is easily accessible by car or bike.

faqs.question: What is the buying process for international purchasers?
faqs.answer: We guide international buyers through every step, including NIE number acquisition, legal representation, bank account opening, and notary procedures. The process typically takes 6-8 weeks from offer acceptance to completion.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with leading Spanish banks and mortgage brokers who specialize in international buyer financing. Non-residents can typically secure up to 70% financing on Costa Blanca properties.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury villas in this prime Jávea location command premium rental rates, particularly during peak season. Properties of this caliber can generate strong annual yields through both long-term and holiday rentals.

faqs.question: When will the villa be completed?
faqs.answer: Villa MIR0156 will be delivered turnkey with an estimated completion timeline that we'll confirm upon reservation. Miralbo Urbana has an excellent track record of on-time delivery.

faqs.question: What is included in the turnkey delivery?
faqs.answer: The villa includes all premium finishes, fitted kitchen with appliances, bathroom installations, air conditioning, built-in wardrobes, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, and carport - ready for immediate occupancy.

faqs.question: Can I arrange a viewing of the property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange site visits to show you the location, architectural plans, and similar completed Miralbo properties. Contact us on +34 634 044 970 or WhatsApp to schedule your viewing.

faqs.question: Are there any additional costs beyond the purchase price?
faqs.answer: Additional costs typically include purchase tax (IVA for new builds), legal fees, notary costs, and registration fees, totaling approximately 12-15% of the purchase price. We'll provide a detailed breakdown of all costs upfront.

faqs.question: What makes Miralbo Urbana special as a developer?
faqs.answer: Miralbo Urbana is renowned for exceptional build quality, premium materials, timely delivery, and comprehensive after-sales service. They specialize in luxury Costa Blanca properties and have an outstanding reputation among international buyers.

content.conclusion: Villa MIR0156 represents a rare opportunity to secure a luxury residence in one of Costa Blanca's most prestigious locations, combining breathtaking sea views, contemporary design, and an unbeatable lifestyle proposition. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Mediterranean paradise - contact our team today at +34 634 044 970 or via WhatsApp to arrange your private viewing and discover why Jávea continues to captivate discerning buyers from around the world.
